message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product. It is worth $8,000 to both of us, and I believe it could greatly benefit you. I am willing to sell it to you for $7,500.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, $7,500 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $6,500 for the product. Let me know what you think.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position, but I must maintain the value of my product. I am unable to accept $6,500. However, I am willing to consider $7,000 as a compromise.
